2054.subject: HPWE
2054.descrlong: Students complete a minimum of 80 hours of fieldwork during this program. Agencies are approved by the Human Performance and Wellness Education department faculty based on the opportunities available for students to work on issues of importance in health and wellness, and the agency's ability to provide mentoring and organization support for the student intern. Check with the Human Performance and Wellness Education department for specific topic. (Offered only as interest warrants.)
